      Parameters:

      public void reactivateMember(User u)

      Parameters:
      u - The user to be reactivated.

    • removeUser

      public void removeUser(String username, String userType)
      Removes a user from the system based on their username and user type. If the user is found and removed successfully, a success message is printed. If the user is not found, an error message is printed.
      Parameters:
      username - The username of the user to be removed.
      userType - The type of the user to be removed.
